attributes.action: Take Britain out of the EU and form an Alliance with English speaking Nations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A democratic vote to take Britain out of the EU, and to form a political and  trading Alliance with the English speaking Nations; the USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and ex-Commonwealth countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
